result.purpose: Responsible for interacting with a blockchain service to retrieve block data.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating functionality related to blockchain RPC calls and data models.

internal/infras/getblock/client.go.purpose: Provides a client for executing RPC calls to a blockchain service.

internal/infras/getblock/models.go.purpose: Defines models for handling block data in the getblock package.
